A4.text: Denny Hamlin drove the No. 11 car in the Sprint Cup Series.

A5.text: From 2004 to 2005, Joe Gibbs Racing partnered with Shaver Motorsports to field the No. 2 car for development drivers in the ARCA Racing Series.
